title: French rail strike to test workers' financial pain threshold
text:
French rail strike to test workers' financial pain threshold   01:54 
French rail unions have launched three months of strike action in a showdown with Emmanuel Macron, but as Kate King reports their capacity to sustain it will depend as much on the durability of their and their workers' finances as on amassing political capital.   
French rail unions have launched three months of strike action in a showdown with Emmanuel Macron, but as Kate King reports their capacity to sustain it will depend as much on the durability of their and their workers' finances as on amassing political capital.  //reut.rs/2Hb1DGe
